'''Yumemiru "Sakura's Rest" Bed''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Yumemiru "Sakura's Rest" Bed is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.
